name: Eva
dialogue: I've been feeling really overwhelmed lately. There's just so much going on in my life, and I'm not sure how to handle it all.

name: Grace
dialogue: Ah, Eva, you're always putting everyone else first, aren't you? Sometimes I think you forget that taking care of yourself is important too.

name: Eva
dialogue: Yeah, maybe a little bit. But when people are hurting or struggling, my heart goes out to them, and I want to help in any way I can.

name: Eva
dialogue: Oh, stop it, guys! It's not that big of a deal.

name: Sophia
dialogue: No, really, Eva, your listening skills are one of the things that makes you such an amazing friend.

name: Grace
dialogue: I couldn't agree more. And speaking of amazing friends, Sophia, how's your garden coming along?

name: Sophia
dialogue: Ah, my garden is doing great, thanks for asking! The tomatoes are really thriving this year.

name: Eva
dialogue: Oh, I love tomatoes! I'm always looking for new recipes to try them in.

name: Grace
dialogue: Well, you're in luck! Sophia here has been experimenting with some delicious-sounding tomato dishes. Maybe we can have a potluck soon and share our favorite recipes?

name: Sophia
dialogue: That sounds like so much fun! And it would be great to get everyone together for once.

name: Eva
dialogue: Absolutely! I'm always up for a good excuse to gather with friends.
